## Introduction

This section given an overview on various helper utilities methods implemented in the package.

  : `getEsqlabsRSetting(settingName)`
    : `esqlabsR` uses a set of default settings that can be accessed with `getEsqlabsRSetting(settingName)`
    
```{r getEsqlabsRSetting, error=TRUE}
getEsqlabsRSetting("widthPerPlotMapping")

getEsqlabsRSetting("Setting that does not exist")
```
